meanings.sent1: The food was dislikeable to me.
meanings.sent3: The idea of wearing socks with sandals is quite dislikeable.
meanings.sent4: The sound of nails on a chalkboard is truly dislikeable.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotten eggs is extremely dislikeable.

meanings.sent1: The smell from the garbage can was dislikeable.
meanings.sent2: His rude behavior was dislikeable to everyone.

meanings.sent4: The sight of the abandoned house was as dislikeable as a haunted mansion.
